ComicInfo.Summary:
Living for Christmas: A man who likes Christmas so much that he uses suspended animation to skip past non-Christmas months, discovers he has lost the true meaning of it until he reunites with a boy that reminds him of his son.
Too Many Santas: A boy, noting the multiple Santa Clauses running around town, learns the true answer to this.
The Stiflemix Diaries: The adventures of the NoÃ«l Liberation Brigade fighting government regulations which outlaw any reference to Christmas except during the Christmas season.
One Winter Day: The grind of snow shovelling in heavy snowfall regions.
Traditions Everlasting: Aliens surveying the ruins of post nuclear holocaust Earth debate the significance of Christmas objects they have found.
ComicInfo.Title: Living for Christmas; Too Many Santas; The Stiflemix Diaries; One Winter Day; Traditions Everlasting
ComicInfo.Writer: Doug Wheeler,Michael Eury,Douglas M. Wheeler,Douglas M. Wheeler,Doug Wheeler
